content:
![dApp preview - stellaswap.png](https://media-resources.subwallet.app/d_App_preview_stellaswap_5865af7a48.png)

Version 1.1.50(364)
>- **New assets supported**: BEEFY on AssetHub and HydraDX, xcDED on Moonbeam 
>- **Warning added**: Do not transfer cross-chain to an exchange!

>![Swap is live.png](https://media-resources.subwallet.app/Swap_is_live_2d8184d2c3.png)
>*  New assets supported: BEEFY on AssetHub and HydraDX, xcDED on Moonbeam 
>---
>*  Warning added: Do not transfer cross-chain to an exchange! [Click here!](https://web.subwallet.app/welcome)

---

#### **Version 1.1.50(364)**
*  New assets supported: BEEFY on AssetHub and HydraDX, xcDED on Moonbeam 
*  Warning added: Do not transfer cross-chain to an exchange! [Click here!](https://web.subwallet.app/welcome)

* New assets supported: BEEFY on AssetHub and HydraDX, xcDED on Moonbeam 
* New assets supported: BEEFY on AssetHub and HydraDX, xcDED on Moonbeam

---

Warning added: Do not transfer cross-chain to an exchange! [Click here!](https://web.subwallet.app/welcome)

#### ![New Currencies.png](https://media-resources.subwallet.app//6/New_Currencies_f827749bdf.png) 

 

#### **Version 1.1.56(375)**
- 9 new currencies supported!
- Go to Settings/General settings/Currency and choose among USD, BRL, CNY, EUR, GBP, HKD, JPY, RUB  and VND to display your portfolio value.

>![Update your iOS version.png](https://media-resources.subwallet.app//6/Update_your_i_OS_version_3cb5c8b03c.png)
>
>  
> 
>#### **Update to iOS 16.4 or above**
>**(Safely dismiss this message if your iOS version is above 16.4)**
>- Your iOS version might be too low for SubWallet new versions to be compatible with. 
>- Update to continue enjoying new features in SubWallet.
  
>
>  
> 
>#### **Reminder to back up your accounts**
>- If you lose your back up files, such as seed phrases, private keys, JSON files, QR code backups, you will lose access to your funds. 
>- Go to the account tab, select your account, click on the pen icon and choose to export and back up!
